org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.align

Class AlnUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.align.AlnUtil

  • public final class AlnUtil
extends Object

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • validHeader

        public static boolean validHeader(String header)
        Checks to see if the given header string is valid. A valid header is a single line that starts with the text "CLUSTAL" or "MUSCLE".
        Parameters:
        header - the header to validate; can not be null.
        Returns:
        true if the header is valid, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if header is null
        IllegalStateException - if there is a problem parsing the header text (should not happen).

      • computeConsensus

        public static NucleotideSequence computeConsensus(File alnFile,
                                                  ConsensusCaller consensusCaller)
                                           throws DataStoreException,
                                                  IOException
        Compute the consensus of the alignment in the given aln file using the given ConsensusCaller.
        Parameters:
        alnFile - the alignment file to parse, can not be null and must exist.
        consensusCaller - the ConsensusCaller to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        a new NucleotideSequence of the called consensus.
        Throws:
        DataStoreException
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the file.
